# CAM::DO_SCREEN_FADE_IN

## Summary
Fade in the main viewport with fade FROM black

## Parameters
* **INT** time

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Fades the screen in.

duration: The time the fade should take, in milliseconds.
